name: Women Techmakers Greece Info Day
description:
Know what WomenTechmakers Greece is and join the community or join the IWD Team to help us out for the big event we are organizing for May in Thessaloniki!

Looking forward in meeting you all!

WTM Greece Team
how_to_find_us: Go to L6 room on the 6th Floor - entrance from Sofou

name: Get to know each other and next steps ;)
description:
We will be gathering at City College to meet new people and to set the tasks for our event on May and for the core-tasks of WTM.
Looking forward in meet up with new face and share our experiences.

We will be meeting at the 6th floor of the Sofou building | LAB 6

name: Dress Code
description:
We are extremely happy to collaborate again with CoderDojo Thessaloniki and create one more codelab for the friends who wants to learn coding in the most creative way!
In this meet up we will learn to use #LilyPad with some coding to make our clothes look crazy, unique and interactive! What to bring: Laptop and a little snack (optional)

RSVP: https://goo.gl/CDBdnp

CoderDojo Thessaloniki is organized with the support of EPY-Macedonia Thrace Chapter and City College, The University of Sheffield International Faculty
how_to_find_us: Meet us at Room L6, 6th floor

name: IWD | Women Techmakers Greece Summit 18 | Building a New Horizon
description:
This is our annual meetup to interact, meet new and old friends (men and women), highlight our needs and achievements, learn about new opportunities and get inspired, create synergies and build all together the future we want, a future of equal opportunities to all.

For the latest updates and the final agenda with speakers, please visit our site https://womentechmakers.gr The event will be open & free to public, registration is obligatory

name: Artificial Intelligence - First Design & Strategy
description:
"AI-first Strategy & Design powered by Women Techmakers Greece"

Speaker:
Alexandra Petrus, Google Developer Expert on Product Strategy

Short description of the talk:
Linking AI Thinking to AI Doing in a world rushed with the AI tech curiosity. Business models, processes, and displays of results need to be adjusted to meet the new tech specificity. Practice continuous learning to be a fast mover, so you can better see results and use the tech as a real competitive advantage. Expect practical, applied AI use cases, pitfalls to avoid and best practices to date. Takeaways: key tenants for a successful and relevant AI strategy and aligning it to its most successful human - machine relation.

Short bio:
Co-Founder Bucharest AI; PM Fintech| Blockchain, DApps, Digital Assets; New Tech Strategist for Startups/Companies & GDE| Product Strategy. Alexandra is helping build products with a purpose, by changing prioritization to humans and experiences. Solving real problems through tech.

Women Techmakers Greece in collabortation with FOUND.ATION will participate at the 83rd Thessaloniki International Fair| Innovation Hub on September 13th 2018. Innovation Hub is an innovation lab area, located inside the US Pavillion (N.13) that will host from 8th to 16th September 2018, innovation workshops, tech meetups, open discussions, digital skills and coding courses under the Tech Talent School initiative and the curation of FOUND.ATION. To book your seat please visit: https://www.eventora.com/en/Events/ai-first-strategy-design-power

Attendees will be seated on a first-come, first-served basis.
The registration is free. An entry ticket to the 83rd TIF applies.
how_to_find_us: Pavillion N.13| Exhibitor's area N.43 "Innovation Hub"

name: DevFest Greece 2018: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
description:
Join us in Heraklion - Crete for an "epic" DevFest.
